Contracted Rotorua emergency housing motels to reduce to seven https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/contracted-rotorua-emergency-housing-motels-to-reduce-to-seven/36ZDVYFJMFD7FL42XIQHQW2LCU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/contracted-rotorua-emergency-housing-motels-to-reduce-to-seven/36ZDVYFJMFD7FL42XIQHQW2LCU/ Kelly MakihaFour motels used for emergency housing are being cut. Fri, 07 Jun 2024 19:22:09 +0000 The motels being exited from contracted emergency housing. Clockwise from top left, Midway Motel, Emerald Spa, Tuscany Villas, Malones Motel. Photos / Kelly Makiha
Hamilton City Council to sell Rototuna site for housing development https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-city-council-to-sell-rototuna-site-for-housing-development/XBRKTGV4WJB5POAMZBIM3TMHXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-city-council-to-sell-rototuna-site-for-housing-development/XBRKTGV4WJB5POAMZBIM3TMHXU/ Hamilton City Council decided to sell the land at a council meeting last week. Fri, 07 Jun 2024 19:00:00 +0000 Between 70 and 100 homes could be built in Rototuna North after a Hamilton City Council decision to sell a block of land on Korikori Green.
Historic Hawke’s Bay: ‘No flies on the meat’ — Havelock North butcher’s impressive claim https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/historic-hawkes-bay-no-flies-on-the-meat-havelock-north-butchers-impressive-claim/6DJJIPZ2XNBBNJOUA2EXK5Q3GM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/historic-hawkes-bay-no-flies-on-the-meat-havelock-north-butchers-impressive-claim/6DJJIPZ2XNBBNJOUA2EXK5Q3GM/ Michael FowlerThis would not have been an easy task, with the meat hanging outside during summer. Fri, 07 Jun 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Arthur Dillon’s butcher shop in Middle Rd, Havelock (North) in 1898. Dillon is holding the horse’s reins, and near him is an unidentified employee. The position of the butcher shop, and the Presbyterian church on its right, is where Gilmours Pharmacy is today.

A street race killed Auckland couple Jill and David McArthur. Now police stand accused of incompetence as a driver escapes with fine and disqualification https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-street-race-killed-auckland- Couple-jill-and-david-mcarthur-now-police-stand-accused-of-incompetence-as-a-驾驶员逃逸并被罚款并取消资格/WATNN7RRCBEYLK62HVDA5SPR3M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-street-race-killed-auckland- Couple-jill-and-david-mcarthur-now-police-stand-accused-of-incompetence-as-a-驾驶员逃逸并被罚款并取消资格/WATNN7RRCBEYLK62HVDA5SPR3M/ George Block'Mum died on a cold road surrounded by the people who killed her.' Letters: Breaking cancer promises unconscionable; who should pay to fix Wynyard Quarter bridge? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-writing-cancer-promises-unconscionable-who-should-pay-to-fix-wynyard-quarter-bridge/BF6SOO6Z4ZEQROXCJWCSEWPCCM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-writing-cancer-promises-unconscionable-who-should-pay-to-fix-wynyard-quarter-bridge/BF6SOO6Z4ZEQROXCJWCSEWPCCM/ OPINION: 'I would rather we had funded cancer drugs than potholes.'
